title: Procedural Content Gen
description: Students will learn algorithmic techniques for creating geometric models and images that can be used for games, feature films or virtual reality.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 1332 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (CS 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2261 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and CS 2340 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
